revision.text:
<languages/> <translate> <!--T:1--> {{Infobox dungeon |name = Sendoff Spring |image = [[File:Sendoff_Spring.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Sendoff Spring. |tokens = 96,500 |location = East of Route 214. }} '''Sendoff Spring''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Sinnoh]]. It initially has 64 tiles arranged in an 8x8 square, including 8 chest tiles, 19 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 2,603,000 HP.
== Encounter Tables == <!--T:2-->
===Wild Encounters=== <!--T:3-->
<!--T:4--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Golbat.png|40px]] Golbat || rowspan=8 colspan=2 | <center> N/A |- | [[File:Golduck.png|40px]] Golduck |- | [[File:Graveler.png|40px]] Graveler |- | [[File:Goldeen.png|40px]] Goldeen |- | [[File:Magikarp.png|40px]] Magikarp |- | [[File:Staravia.png|40px]] Staravia |- | [[File:Bibarel.png|40px]] Bibarel |- | [[File:Chingling.png|40px]] Chingling |}
===Boss Encounters=== <!--T:5-->
<!--T:6--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! Base Health !! Boss Trainer !! Pokémon Team !! Base Health |- | [[File:Seaking.png|40px]] Seaking || rowspan=3|<center>10,000,000 || colspan=3 rowspan=3|<center> N/A |- | [[File:Gyarados.png|40px]] Gyarados |- | [[File:Dusclops.png|40px]] Dusclops |}
==Items== <!--T:7-->
<tabs> <!--T:8--> <tab name="No Debuff">
<!--T:9--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Weight !! 0 Clears !! 100 Clears !! 500 Clears |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Common''' |- | {{Bag2|xClick}} || N/A || 37.87% || 36.66% || 31.60% |- | {{Bag2|Token Collector}} || N/A || 37.87% || 36.66% || 31.60% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Rare''' |- | {{Bag2|White Shard}} || N/A || 10.11% || 10.69% || 13.14% |- | {{Bag2|Black Shard}} || N/A || 10.11% || 10.69% || 13.14% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Epic''' |- | {{Bag2|Spooky Plate}} || N/A || 2.03% || 2.65% || 5.27% |- | {{Bag2|Draco Plate}} || N/A || 2.03% || 2.65% || 5.27% |} </tab>
<tab name="Debuff"> <!--T:10-->
<!--T:11--> After Reaching Alola, the drop chance for items in Sinnoh will be debuffed for any loot with a Tier rarer than Rare (ie: Epic, Legendary, Mythic).
<!--T:12--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Weight !! 0 Clears !! 100 Clears !! 500 Clears |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Common''' |- | {{Bag2|xClick}} || N/A || 37.54% || 37.54% || 37.54% |- | {{Bag2|Token Collector}} || N/A || 37.54% || 37.54% || 37.54% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Rare''' |- | {{Bag2|White Shard}} || N/A || 12.01% || 12.01% || 12.01% |- | {{Bag2|Black Shard}} || N/A || 12.01% || 12.01% || 12.01% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Epic''' |- | {{Bag2|Spooky Plate}} || N/A || 0.45% || 0.45% || 0.45% |- | {{Bag2|Draco Plate}} || N/A || 0.45% || 0.45% || 0.45% |} </tab> </tabs>
